t: r/popcorn on Reddit: What's up with Quinn lately?
s: October 10, 2022 - Did something happen to Quinn's manufacturing facilities? Is their workforce on strike? Are they stealthily getting out of the popcorn business?? Both varieties taste 1000% better than Orville Redenbacher. It would be a terrible shame if I could no longer get it; as sad as when Kernel Seasons discontinued its Sour Cream & Onion seasoning.
